add(address,uint256,bool).details: Can only be called by the owner      The reward speed can be 0 and set later by setFurionReward function

params._basicFurionPerSecond: Basic reward speed(per second) for this new pool

massUpdatePools().details: Can be called by anyone      Only update those active pools

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._basicFurionPerSecond: New basic reward amount per second
New basic reward amount per second
params._poolId: Id collection of the farming pool

stake(uint256,uint256).details: Can only stake to the pools that are still farming

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._amount: Amount of lp tokens to withdraw

add(address,uint256,bool).notice: Add a new lp into the pool

harvest(uint256,address).notice: Harvest the Furion reward and can be sent to another address

massUpdatePools().notice: Update all farming pools (except for those stopped ones)

pendingFurion(uint256,address).notice: Check the amount of pending Furion reward

setFurionReward(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Update the FurionPerSecond for a specific pool (set to 0 to stop farming)

setFurionRewards(uint256[],uint256[],boo.notice: Update the FurionPerSecond for a bundle of pools (used for daily updating farming rate)

stake(uint256,uint256).notice: Stake LP token into the farming pool
